name: salmonella-testing-programme
title: Salmonella testing programme
description: Results of the Food Standards Agency’s Salmonella Testing Programme which applies to food business operators processing over 37,500 pigs a year. The results are reported by month.

resources.name: Salmonella testing programme 2016
resources.description: Results of the Food Standards Agency’s Salmonella Testing Programme which applies to food business operators processing over 37,500 pigs a year. The results are reported by month for the year 2016.
